name: Biker's Paradise
description:
Have fun in a world where bicycles abound! Take risks, take loop de loops, and jump to your heart’s content.

Keyboard
WASD & space to move, shift to crouch or bring yourself upright. Esc to return to main menu and Tab to quit.

Gamepad
Left joystick to move, A to jump, and Y to crouch or bring yourself upright. Start button returns to main menu and Back button quits.
